description: Ministry of Land & Land Development - Order to appoint Mr. A.G.Sirisena & 13 other officers to expidite the land aquisitions for the Road Development Authority in respect of the Southern Expressway Project  - Agencies with effect from 27.08.2014 purpose of Mortgage Act - Declaring Vallibel Finance PLC and 02 other Institutions as Approved Credit Agencies with effect from 28.08.2014 for the purpose of the Trusts Receipts Ordinance
